
GLM in H2O

```{r}
library(h2o)
h2o.init()
```

```{r}
url <- "http://coursera.h2o.ai/data/smoking.csv"
data <- h2o.importFile(url)
```

```{r}
data
summary(data)
h2o.sum(data[,3])
```

```{r}
x = 1:2
y = 5
```

GLM model 
```{r}
m <- h2o.glm(x,y, data,
             family = "poisson",
             model_id = "smoking_p",
             #nfold = 12,
             #fold_assignment = "Modulo"
             )
```

```{r}
m
```
